title: Villa Type Luxury House with Pool for Sale
details:
Modern super luxury Villa type house located in a very peaceful as well as tranquil environment in Battaramulla-Koswatte now available for sale.

The Property comes semi-furnished with following features:-

• Land Extent 42 Perches
• Floor Area of the House 4,800Sqft
• 2 Stories
• Fully Air-conditioned
• 6 Bedrooms (Master Bedroom with attached bathroom)
• 4 Bathrooms
• Sitting / Living Area Ground Floor
• TV Lounge / Pantry area on the 1st floor
• Office Room on the 1st floor
• Fully Equipped Pantry & Seperate Kitchen
• Veranda near the Swimming Pool
• Spacious Swimming Pool with scenic paddy field view
• Terrace overlooking the Pool and scenic paddy field view on 1st floor
• Outer Wet Kitchen area
• Maids / Drivers Quarters
• 2 Car Garage
• Paved front & rear Gardens
• CCTV System
• Solar Hot Water

Quoted Price :- LKR 80 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS WILL BE ENTERTAINED
